code: import axios from"axios";var instance=axios.create({baseURL:'https://rickandmortyapi.com/api'});export var mainAPI={getData:function getData(page){return instance.get("/character/?page=".concat(page));},getCharacter:function getCharacter(id){return instance.get("/character/".concat(id));},getEpisodes:function getEpisodes(id){return instance.get("/episode/".concat(id));},getEpisodeByCode:function getEpisodeByCode(code){return instance.get("/episode/?episode=".concat(code));}};
